properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, USER_NAME, COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = 4 ORDER BY BOARD_NO ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = 4
INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER, CREATE_DATE, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, 4, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE, 'Y' )
SELECT SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL AS BOARD_NO FROM DUAL
UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = NVL(COUNT,0) + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, USER_NICKNAME, B.CREATE_DATE, COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 4 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = ?, BOARD_CONTENT = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = '4'
UPDATE BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND BOARD_TYPE = '4'

SELECT ROWNUM, BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 4 AND STATUS='Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3
SELECT BOARD_NO, FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME AS FILENAME FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT AT ON(BOARD_NO = REF_BNO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 and ORIGIN_NAME is not null AND ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5
